comments.body: `ifr` should still be callable, so (1) there should be a test of that (2) you'll still need all the previous code in index.d.ts.

@sandersn - I think this is what you were referring to. This is the combination I could find that would allow `ifr` to be callable and still allow the `import { iframeResizer } from 'iframe-resizer';` version to work as expected.
